CHANNEL_LIST.TITLE: Channel List
CHANNEL_LIST.CONTENT: Please select the channel you are not able to watch from the list below:

CHANNEL_LIST_DIALOG.TITLE: Channel is not on the list
CHANNEL_LIST_DIALOG.CONTENT1: The channel is not available as part of the TV package you have subscribed.
CHANNEL_LIST_DIALOG.CONTENT2: If you wish to subscribe more channels, please click here.

MESSAGES.THANKYOU_BODY: Thank you for using Self-care. Hope we could make your experience better.
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION: We are moving your eLife connection
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION_BODY_1: The service will be discontinued while the transfer is under process.
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION_BODY_2: Try using it once your eLife connection has been moved successfully.
MESSAGES.ACCOUNT_TEMPORARILY_DISCONNECTED_BODY: The service won’t work as your account has been disconnected temporarily based upon your request. The service will be back on <XXX>. Click here if you want to reconnect your service.
MESSAGES.ELIFE_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_PROGRESS: You eLife service cancellation request is in progress
MESSAGES.ELIFE_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_PROGRESS_BODY: The service won’t work as your account is being cancelled based upon your request.
MESSAGES.COMPLAINT_ALREADY_EXISTS_BODY: Our technicians are already working on resolving the issue. Do you want to follow-up on the same complaint?
MESSAGES.APPOINTMENT_BOOK_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY: We have received your complain and booked an appointment. Our technician will contact you soon
MESSAGES.OPEN_SERVICE_REQUEST_BODY: We noticed that there is an open Service Request
MESSAGES.PACKAGE_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY: Package upgrade request was raised successfully
MESSAGES.PACKAGE_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY_BOD: Thank you for your request. We will call you back within 24 hrs.
MESSAGES.ROUTER_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY: Router upgrade request was raised successfully
MESSAGES.ROUTER_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY: Thank you for your request. We will call you back within 24 hrs.
MESSAGES.ACCOUNT_DISCONNECTED_TEMPORARILY_BODY: if you wish to get bill details / make payment
MESSAGES.ROUTER_PACKAGE_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFU: Router & Package upgrade request was raised successfully
Thank you for your request. We will call you back within 24 hrs.
MESSAGES.THIRD_PARTY_ROUTER_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY: New router request was raised successfully
MESSAGES.THIRD_PARTY_ROUTER_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY_: Thank you for your request. We will call you back within 24 hrs.
MESSAGES.RESET_WIIF_PASSWORD_FIRST_SUCCESSFULLY_B: Please wait for 5 minutes before using the internet again.  Continue to configure your Wi-Fi settings.
MESSAGES.RESET_WIIF_PASSWORD_SECOND_SUCCESSFULLY_: Please wait for 5 minutes and then try using the internet again.  Your new password is <XXXX>.Make sure to use the new Wi-Fi password to connect to the router.
MESSAGES.TROUBLESHOOT_COMPLETE_BODY: We couldn't find any technical problem with the service. You can book an appointment with a technician if you're still facing an issue. Please note that you might get charged AED 150 for the technician visit if the issue isn't from our side.
MESSAGES.TV_AMDIN_PIN_RESET_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY1: Your PIN has been successfully reset to the default PIN: 1111.
MESSAGES.TV_AMDIN_PIN_RESET_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY2: Please restart all your TV boxes to activate the new PIN.
MESSAGES.TV_AMDIN_PIN_RESET_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY3: Note: You will be required to change the default PIN when you log in to any paid service.
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_RESTART_REQUIRED_SUCCESSFULLY_BOD: Please wait for 5 minutes and then try using the internet again.
MESSAGES.NO_INTERNET_CONNECTION_BODY: We are facing an unplanned interruption of home services in your area which is beyond our control. Rest assured that that our teams are working on resolving the issue. We shall send an SMS to your registered contact number once the service is restored
MESSAGES.NO_INTERNET_CONNECTION_BODY2: The internet service is down. We are sorry to be holding you up this time.  Please try again later or book an appointment for a technician visit instead.
MESSAGES.RESET_ELIFEON_PIN_BODY1: Please reset your eLifeON PIN to fix the issue.
MESSAGES.RESET_ELIFEON_PIN_BODY2: It will be reset to the default PIN: 1111@elife
MESSAGES.RESET_ELIFEON_PIN_RESETPIN_SUCCESS_BODY: Your PIN has been successfully reset to the default PIN.
MESSAGES.ISSUE_FIXED_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY1: We have fixed the technical issues. Please restart the router and then try using the internet again.
MESSAGES.ISSUE_FIXED_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY2: We have fixed the technical issues.  Please reset the router and then try using the internet again.
MESSAGES.RESET_YOUR_PASSWORD_BODY: We have fixed all the technical issues. You need to reset your password for the internet to work normally.
MESSAGES.ROUTER_NOT_ACCESSIBLE_BODY: We are unable to reach your device.
MESSAGES.RECONFIGURE_YOUR_ROUTER_BODY1: Since you are using your own router, make sure that:
MESSAGES.RECONFIGURE_YOUR_ROUTER_BODY1_POINT2: The cable from the router is connected to the 'X' port of the wall mounted fibre box
MESSAGES.RECONFIGURE_YOUR_ROUTER_BODY1_POINT3: If issue is still not fixed, please reconfigure your router with the correct settings
MESSAGES.RECONFIGURE_YOUR_ROUTER_BODY2: Tap 'Book an appointment' if you want to book a technician visit.
MESSAGES.RECONFIGURE_YOUR_ROUTER_BODY3: Visit Device Care to find more details on how to reconfigure your router.
MESSAGES.NO_ISSUE_FOUND_BODY1: We didn't find any technical issues. Your internet should work normally.
MESSAGES.NO_ISSUE_FOUND_BODY2: Tap 'Continue to troubleshooting' if there is a specific technical issue, or ‘View Details’ to take a closer look at your internet service.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY1: We didn't find any technical issues.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY3: We noticed that your router is not capable of handling high internet speed. You may be facing issue of slow browsing due to this. Its highly recommended to upgrade your router for better experience and elimination of repeated internet issues
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY4: Tap “Upgrade Router” if you wish to upgrade the router
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY5: Tap 'Continue to troubleshooting' if there is a specific technical issue, or ‘View Details’ to take a closer look at your internet service.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY6: We noticed that the internet speed you have is incapable of handling your usage. You may be facing issue of slow browsing due to this. It is highly recommended to upgrade your package for better experience and elimination of repeated internet issues.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY7: Tap “Upgrade Package” if you wish to upgrade the router
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY8: We noticed that your router is not capable to handle high internet speed. Beside this you have an Internet speed that is incapable of handling your usage. You may be facing issue of slow browsing due to this. It is highly recommended to upgrade both your Router and your package for better experience and elimination of repeated internet issues.
MESSAGES.UPGRADE_RECOMENDED_BODY9: Tap “Upgrade Router &  Package” if you wish to upgrade the router
MESSAGES.GAME_SESSION_CANCEL_CONFIRMED_BODY: <eLife TV game name> has been restarted successfully. You can now launch a new game session from the main menu of eLife TV Gaming.
MESSAGES.ROUTER_3RD_PARTY_BODY1: We didn't find any technical issues.
MESSAGES.ROUTER_3RD_PARTY_BODY3: We noticed that you are facing a continue issues with the internet while using a non-etisalat router.
MESSAGES.ROUTER_3RD_PARTY_BODY4: Its highly recommended to use an Etisalat router for better experience and elimination of repeated internet issues.
MESSAGES.ROUTER_3RD_PARTY_BODY5: Tap “Buy New Router” if you wish to buy new router from Etisalat
MESSAGES.ROUTER_3RD_PARTY_BODY6: Tap 'Continue to troubleshooting' if there is a specific technical issue, or ‘View Details’ to take a closer look at your internet service.
MESSAGES.WIFI_ALARM_BODY1: We didn't find any technical issues.
MESSAGES.WIFI_ALARM_BODY3: We noticed that your Wi-Fi settings are not to the standards. We can help you to get your Wi-Fi configuration to the standards.
MESSAGES.WIFI_ALARM_BODY4: Tap “Configure Wi-Fi” if you wish to set your Wi-Fi configuration.
MESSAGES.WIFI_ALARM_BODY5: Tap 'Continue to troubleshooting' if there is a specific technical issue or ‘View Details’ to take a closer look at your internet service.
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE: We can’t reach your TV box
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE_BODY1: The TV box SR No. 53454534 couldn’t be found.
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE_BODY2_POINT1: The TV box is turned on
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE_BODY2_POINT2: The cable from the TV box is connected to the 'X' port of the wall mounted fiber box
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE_AGAIN: We can’t reach your TV box
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE_AGAIN_BODY1: One of these options could be causing the issue:
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE_AGAIN_BODY1_POINT1: The TV box is not switched on
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE_AGAIN_BODY2: Tap 'Try again later' if you want to check the problem later.
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_NOT_REACHABLE_AGAIN_BODY3: Tap 'Book an appointment' if you want to book a technician visit.
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_RESTART_REQUIRED_BODY1: We have fixed all the technical issues.
MESSAGES.TV_BOX_RESTART_REQUIRED_BODY2: Please restart the TV box and then try using the TV again.
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_WATCH_CHNANNEL_BODY1_POINT1: Plug the TV box to turn it on and wait for the LED to turn red
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_WATCH_CHNANNEL_BODY1_POINT2: Press the power button on your remote control
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_WATCH_CHNANNEL_BODY1_POINT3: If you are unable to turn the TV box on, check the battery of the remote control
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_WATCH_CHNANNEL_BODY1_POINT4: If TV box works but you are unable to watch a channel, check whether the cable from TV box is connected to “X” port of the Optical Network Terminal (ONT)
MESSAGES.TVBOX_RESET_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY: You should be able to watch the channel now. Please confirm whether the issue has been fixed or not.
MESSAGES.UNPLANNED_INTERRUPTION_BODY: We are facing an unplanned interruption of home services in your area which is beyond our control. Rest assured that that our teams are working on resolving the issue. We shall send an SMS to your registered contact number once the service is restored
MESSAGES.PACKAGE_TRANSFER_SUCCESS_BODY: Please reboot your TV box, then you will be able to enjoy the service.
MESSAGES.UNABLE_WATCH_SPECIFIC_CHANNEL_PACKAGE_TR: You can now watch all the channels in <package name> on TV box <SL no.>.
MESSAGES.RESET_INTERNET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_BODY: The router will be configured with the new password automatically.
MESSAGES.RESET_INTERNET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_BODY2: Make sure you restart your router after a few minutes and then try using the internet.
MESSAGES.Error_Occured_BODY: Sorry, the operation has timeout. Please try again.
MESSAGES.Error_Occured_TRY_AGAIN_BODY: Sorry, the operation has timeout. Please try again after some time.
MESSAGES.RESET_INTERNET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_DETAIL_B: The router needs to be configured with the new password. Visit 'Device Care' to find more details on how to reconfigure your router.
We recommend using an Etisalat router so that we can provice remote support.
MESSAGES.RESET_ROUTER_WIFI_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_BODY: Please wait for 2 minutes and then try connecting to the Wi-Fi network with the password.
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_REACH_ROUTER_BODY: Make sure that router is turned on and is connected to the 'X' port of the wall-mounted fiber box.
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_REACH_ROUTER_FAILED_BODY: Tap 'Continue to troubleshooting' if you think this is related to a technical issue.
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_RESET_PASSWORD_BODY: We can't reset your Wi-Fi password because you don't have an Etisalat router.
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_RESET_PASSWORD_BODY2: We recommend using an Etisalat router so that we can provide remote support.
MESSAGES.UNABLE_TO_PROCESS_REQUEST_BODY: It looks like you are not subscribed to eLifeON.

TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PARA1: By accepting the T&C, you confirm that all information by you is correct and you bear responsibility if there will be any discrepancy in the documents and will liable for the action.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PARA2: Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

ROUTER_RESTART.RESTART_ROUTER_H2: You can follow these steps to reboot your router
ROUTER_RESTART.RESTART_ROUTER_H3: Consult device care for specific device guides
ROUTER_RESTART.ROUTER_DIDNOT_RESTART_H2: Follow these steps to restart your router
ROUTER_RESTART.ROUTER_DIDNOT_RESTART_H3_MSG: Where you can find more details on how to restart your router.

INSTRUCTIONS_STEPS_OR.TVBOX_RESTART_BODY: Where you can find more details on how to restart your TV box.

DEVICE_CARE.PAGE_CONTENT: Travelling abroad? Take your local plan’s data and voice allowances with you to keep in touch with your family and loved ones when you subscribe to Roam like Home packs, starting from only AED 100. Available to all postpaid Freedom plans. Simply choose the pack that suits you best.
DEVICE_CARE.TVBOX_RESTART_CONTENT: Travelling abroad? Take your local plan’s data and voice allowances with you to keep in touch with your family and loved ones when you subscribe to Roam like Home packs, starting from only AED 100. Available to all postpaid Freedom plans. Simply choose the pack that suits you best.
DEVICE_CARE.UNABLE_TO_WATCH_CHANNELS_CONTENT: If you are still unable to watch <channel name>, tap 'Reset TV box' so that we can reset it remotely.

DIALOG.PASSWORD_WASNOT_RESET_DESCRIPTION: Please note that the issue won't be fixed until the password is changed and the router is configured with the new password
DIALOG.INTERNET_ISSUE_CONTINUE: Once you complete these steps, tap 'Continue'.
DIALOG.INTERNET_ISSUE_EXIST_TROUBLESHOOTING: If you want to complete these steps later, tap 'Exist troubleshooting'.
DIALOG.RESET_TV_ADMIN_PIN_BODY: Your PIN will be reset to the default PIN: 1111.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS1: Please note that the issue won't be fixed until you restart your router.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS2: You can also restart your router manually.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS3: Once you restart your router, wait for 5 minutes and then try using the internet again.
DIALOG.INTERNET_ISSUE_LIST_MESSAGE: Check wi-fi coverage guidlines to solve connectivity issues.
DIALOG.RESET_FACTORY_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: The router's Wi-Fi will be reset to default factory settings.
DIALOG.RESET_FACTORY_DEFAULT_NOTE: Note: You will lose all settings after the factory reset.
DIALOG.ROUTER_NOT_REACHABLE_DESCRIPTION: Please check if:• Router is switched on• The cable from the router is connected to the 'X' port of the wall mounted fibre box Once you complete these steps, tap 'Continue'.If you want to complete these steps later, tap 'Exit troubleshooting'.
DIALOG.GAME_SESSION_P1: Are you sure you want to quit <eLife TV game name>? Any unsaved changes will be lost.
DIALOG.GAME_SESSION_P2: You can launch a new game session from the main menu of eLife TV Gaming.
DIALOG.TVBOX_ROUTER_INS1: Please note that the issue won’t be fixed until you restart your TV box.
DIALOG.TVBOX_ROUTER_INS2: You can also restart your TV box manually.
DIALOG.TVBOX_ROUTER_INS3: Once you restart your TV box, wait for 5 minutes and then try using the internet again.

LOADER.SUCCESS_BODY_1: Please wait while our automated system is diagnosing the service.
LOADER.SUCCESS_BODY_2: This will take up to 1 minute
LOADER.FALIURE_BODY: It is taking longer than expected. Kindly wait

BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION1_STEP1: Select the operating system and browser from the drop-down menu in order to learn more about proxy configuration.
BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION2_STEP1: Please make sure that your PC/laptop browser is configured with the correct proxy settings.
BROWSERSTEPPER.IMG_TEXT_STEP1: Picture or animated GIF of how to reach proxy configuration setting in a browser
BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION1_STEP2: Select the operating system and type of connectivity (Wi-Fi or LAN cable) from the drop-down menu in order to learn more about DNS configuration.
BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION2_STEP2: Please make sure that your PC/laptop browser is configured with the correct DNS settings.
BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION1_STEP3: Select the operating system and browser from the drop-down menu in order to learn more about proxy configuration.
